title: Hands-on with Wi-Fi hacking
subtitle: Hands on with WI-FI Hacking on the ESP8266
description:
Hands-on with Wi-Fi hacking
Want to learn how Wi-Fi hacking works, and go home with your own esp8266 Wi-Fi deauther? Come to the first LA Cyber Weapons Lab meetup to learn how hackers can shut down any Wi-Fi network in seconds with a low-cost microcontroller. Kody Kinzie will explain how the most common Wi-Fi attacks work, focusing on using low-cost microcontrollers and Raspberry Pi computers to crack passwords and attack IoT devices like WI-Fi security cameras.
